analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x88bea03224f67f2fa101c227755d08ebf119feda.sol:
	Contract MagnetChain has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x88bea03224f67f2fa101c227755d08ebf119feda.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
